80Creation of 
Corporate Social 
Responsibility (CSR) 
Program Manager Role 
 
In June 2021, we announced the creation of a CSR Program Manager 
role reporting directly to our chief human resources officer. The role will 
focus on leading the development of ArcBest’s DEI strategy, roadmap 
and initiatives and partnering with leaders in the organization to 
implement and manage key aspects of employee policies and programs. 
This role will also drive advancement of our people and community 
programs, including activities related to human rights, volunteerism and 
corporate and employee giving.
